page.title: 12RECREATION:VILLAGE HALL
page.content: A typical Monday's caretaking is: 08.00:Puts out rubbish for collection 09.10:Playgroup 12.00:Sweeps up,closes hall.Lunch. 13.00:Mother and Toddlers Group. 15.00:Sweeps up and closes hall. 17.50:Junior,Senior Badminton{Clubs. 21.00:Cleans,locks hall until Tuesday. Cleaning chores have become easier as he has a new machine which washes and polishes the floor.Still, the worst time for cleaning is after Youth{Club} and a Dancing Festival.To scrub the whole building is a full day's work. Our caretaker finds his job satisfying because he meets people of all ages,he earns extra cash without affecting his pension and it gives him something worthwhile to do. Although his actual working hours may seem short,our village hall could not function without our caretaker.
